sense.gloss: to be completed, to be finished, to be ready (e.g. to serve or eat)

sdata.j: ↑枠↑↓わく↓が↑出来上↑↓|できあ↓がる|と、クモはちょうど↑自転車↑↓じてんしゃ↓の↑車輪↑↓しゃりん↓のやのように、それに↑絹↑↓きぬ↓の↑糸↑↓いと↓をかける。
sdata.e: When the frame is finished, the spider fixes lines of silk across it, just like the spokes of a bicycle wheel.

sdata.j: ↑近日↑↓きんじつ↓↑中↑↓ちゅう↓に↑台所↑↓だいどころ↓が↑出来上↑↓|できあ↓がる|。
sdata.e: One of these days, the kitchen will be ready.
